Category.Name: DeviceControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for device information and control.
Category.Description: Category for device information and control.

Category.Name: ImageFormatControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Image Format Control features.
Category.Description: Category for Image Format Control features.

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Category.Name: DigitalIOControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the digital input and output control features.

Category.Name: CounterAndTimerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Counter and Timer control features.

Category.Name: AnalogControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the Analog control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Analog control features.

Category.Name: LUTControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that includes the LUT control features.
Category.Description: Category that includes the LUT control features.

Category.Name: DataRoiControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that includes the data ROI control features.
Category.Description: Category that includes the data ROI control features.

Category.Name: CoolingControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the cooling control features.
Category.Description: Category for the cooling control features.

Category.Name: DSNUControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for dark signal non-uniformity correction features.
Category.Description: Category for dark signal non-uniformity correction features.

Category.Name: FlatFieldControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for flat field correction features.
Category.Description: Category for flat field correction features.

Category.Name: TransportLayerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the transport Layer control features.

Category.Name: CoaXPress
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the features pertaining to the CoaXPress transport layer of the device.
Category.Description: Category that contains the features pertaining to the CoaXPress transport layer of the device.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Category.Name: SequencerControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the Sequencer Control features.
Category.Description: Category for the Sequencer Control features.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceScanType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Scan type of the sensor of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Scan type of the sensor of the device.

String.Name: DeviceVendorName
String.ToolTip: Name of the manufacturer of the device.
String.Description: Name of the manufacturer of the device.

String.Name: DeviceSerialNumber
String.Description: Device`s serial number. This string is a unique identifier of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Major version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceSFNCVersionSubMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of Standard Features Naming Convention that was used to create the device`s GenICam XML.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestEntrySelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the manifest entry to reference.
Integer.Description: Selects the manifest entry to reference.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestXMLMajorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the major version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestXMLMinorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the minor version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestXMLSubMinorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the subminor version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the subminor version number of the GenICam XML file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.DisplayName: Device Manifest XML Sub Minor Version

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestSchemaMajorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the major version number of the schema file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the major version number of the schema file of the selected manifest entry.

Integer.Name: DeviceManifestSchemaMinorVersion
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the minor version number of the schema file of the selected manifest entry.
Integer.Description: Indicates the minor version number of the schema file of the selected manifest entry.

String.Name: DeviceManifestPrimaryURL
String.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file of the selected manifest entry.
String.Description: Indicates the first URL to the GenICam XML device description file of the selected manifest entry.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTLType
Enumeration.ToolTip: Transport Layer type of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Transport Layer type of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: Major version of the Transport Layer of the device.
Integer.Description: Major version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.
Integer.Description: Minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceTLVersionSubMinor
Integer.ToolTip: Sub minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.
Integer.Description: Sub minor version of the Transport Layer of the device.

Integer.Name: DeviceLinkSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which Link of the device to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which Link of the device to control.

Float.Name: DeviceLinkSpeed
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.
Float.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated on the specified Link.

Float.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
Float.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data(MB/s).
Float.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data(MB/s).

Float.Name: DeviceLinkCommandTimeout
Float.ToolTip: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link.
Float.Description: Indicates the command timeout of the specified Link. This corresponds to the maximum response time of the device for a command sent on that link.

Command.Name: DeviceReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the device to its power up state.
Command.Description: Resets the device to its power up state.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceIndicatorMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the behavior of the indicators (such as LEDs) showing the status of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the behavior of the indicators (such as LEDs) showing the status of the Device.

EnumEntry.Name: Active
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device`s indicators are active showing their respective status.
EnumEntry.Description: Device`s indicators are active showing their respective status.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTemperatureSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the location within the device, where the temperature will be measured.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature of the image sensor of the camera.

Float.Name: DeviceTemperature
Float.Description: Device temperature in degrees Celsius (C). It is measured at the location selected by DeviceTemperatureSelector.

Integer.Name: Timestamp
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Reports the current value of the device timestamp counter.

Integer.Name: TimestampIncrement
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the increment of the device timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Reports the increment of the device timestamp counter.

Command.Name: TimestampReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter.
Command.Description: Resets the current value of the device timestamp counter.

Integer.Name: TimestampResetValue
Integer.ToolTip: Sets reset value of timestamp. It is adjusted when TimestampReset is executed.
Integer.Description: Sets reset value of timestamp. It is adjusted when TimestampReset is executed.

Command.Name: TimestampLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current timestamp counter into TimestampLatchValue.
Command.Description: Latches the current timestamp counter into TimestampLatchValue.

Integer.Name: TimestampLatchValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched value of the timestamp counter.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontal
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Enumeration.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: BinningVertical
Enumeration.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Enumeration.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixel to use for acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: TestPattern
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is coming from the sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is coming from the sensor.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyHorizontalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled horizontally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyDiagonalRamp
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest.

EnumEntry.Name: GreyDiagonalRampMoving
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from left-top to right-bottom at each frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled diagonally with an image that goes from the darkest possible value to the brightest and that moves verticaly from left-top to right-bottom at each frame.

EnumEntry.Name: SensorSpecific
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Image is filled with the pattern generated by sensor.
EnumEntry.Description: Image is filled with the pattern generated by sensor.

Boolean.Name: DefectivePixelCorrection
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if defective pixel correction is active.
Boolean.Description: Controls if defective pixel correction is active.

Float.Name: DefectivePixelOffsetThreshold
Float.ToolTip: Sets offset threshold of dynamic defective pixel correction.
Float.Description: Sets offset threshold of dynamic defective pixel correction.

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger controlling the start of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger controlling the start of the exposure of one Frame (or Line).

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On.

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which User Output bit signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which User Output bit signal to use as internal source for the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: CXPin
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that trigger packet of coaxpress is used as trigger source.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that trigger packet of coaxpress is used as trigger source.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer0Active
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen Timer is in active state.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen Timer is in active state.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that external input pin is used as trigger source.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that external input pin is used as trigger source.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart (see Figure 53 and Figure 54).

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration. Note that if the Frame or Line TriggerActivation is RisingEdge or LevelHigh, the exposure duration will be the time the trigger stays High. If TriggerActivation is FallingEdge or LevelLow, the exposure time will last as long as the trigger stays Low.

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light.

Enumeration.Name: LineSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the physical line (or pin) of the external device connector to configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.
EnumEntry.Description: Index of the physical line and associated I/O control block to use.

Enumeration.Name: LineMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the physical Line is used to Input or Output a signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Input
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Input an electrical signal.

EnumEntry.Name: Output
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected physical line is used to Output an electrical signal.

Boolean.Name: LineInverter
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
Boolean.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.

Enumeration.Name: LineSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line. LineMode must be Output.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is doing the exposure of a Frame.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing the capture of a Frame.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen User Output Bit state as defined by its current UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: Timer0Active
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The chosen Timer is in active state.
EnumEntry.Description: The chosen Timer is in active state.

Enumeration.Name: UserOutputSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which bit of the User Output register will be set by UserOutputValue.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutput0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the bit 0 of the User Output register.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the bit 0 of the User Output register.

Boolean.Name: UserOutputValue
Boolean.ToolTip: Sets the value of user output.
Boolean.Description: Sets the value of user output.

Float.Name: DebounceTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets debounce time (in microseconds) of input line.
Float.Description: Sets debounce time (in microseconds) of input line.

Enumeration.Name: TimerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Timer to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Timer to configure.

Float.Name: TimerDuration
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse.
Float.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse.

Float.Name: TimerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before to start the Timer.
Float.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before to start the Timer.

Command.Name: TimerReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected timer and starts it.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected timer and starts it. The timer starts counting events immediately after the reset unless a timer trigger is active.

Float.Name: TimerValue
Float.ToolTip: Reads or writes the current value (in microseconds) of the selected Timer.
Float.Description: Reads or writes the current value (in microseconds) of the selected Timer.

Enumeration.Name: TimerStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the current state of the Timer.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the current state of the Timer.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerIdle
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Timer is idle. TimerTriggerSource is Off.
EnumEntry.Description: The Timer is idle. TimerTriggerSource is Off.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Timer is waiting for a start trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: The Timer is waiting for a start trigger.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Timer is counting for the specified duration.
EnumEntry.Description: The Timer is counting for the specified duration.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerCompleted
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The Timer reached the TimerDuration count.
EnumEntry.Description: The Timer reached the TimerDuration count.

Enumeration.Name: TimerTriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts with the reception of the Exposure active.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Exposure active.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts with the reception of the Frame active.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Frame active.

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts when the specidfied TimerTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts when the specidfied TimerTriggerActivation condition is met on the chosen I/O Line.

EnumEntry.Name: Strobe
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts with the reception of the Strobe.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Strobe.

Enumeration.Name: TimerTriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Timer.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Timer.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts counting on the Rising Edge of the selected trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts counting on the Rising Edge of the selected trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts counting on the Falling Edge of the selected trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts counting on the Falling Edge of the selected trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: AnyEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Starts counting on the Falling or Rising Edge of the selected trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Starts counting on the Falling or Rising Edge of the selected trigger signal.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelHigh
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts as long as the selected trigger signal level is High.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts as long as the selected trigger signal level is High.

EnumEntry.Name: LevelLow
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Counts as long as the selected trigger signal level is Low.
EnumEntry.Description: Counts as long as the selected trigger signal level is Low.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: AnalogAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all analog channels or taps.

EnumEntry.Name: DigitalAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all digital channels or taps.

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceRatioSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Balance ratio to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Balance ratio to control.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the red channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Green
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the green channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the green channel.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Balance Ratio will be applied to the blue channel.

Float.Name: BalanceRatio
Float.ToolTip: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component.
Float.Description: Controls ratio of the selected color component to a reference color component. It is used for white balancing.

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is user controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is user controlled using BalanceRatioSelector and BalanceRatio.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state.

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.

Enumeration.Name: LUTSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which LUT to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which LUT to control.

Integer.Name: LUTIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.
Integer.Description: Control the index (offset) of the coefficient to access in the selected LUT.

Integer.Name: LUTValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
Integer.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.

Command.Name: LUTSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves current LUT data to nonvolatile memory.
Command.Description: Saves current LUT data to nonvolatile memory.

Command.Name: LUTLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads LUT data from nonvolatile memory.
Command.Description: Loads LUT data from nonvolatile memory.

Enumeration.Name: RoiSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which ROI(Region Of Interest) is controlled by the various ROI features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which ROI(Region Of Interest) is controlled by the various ROI features.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureAuto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data ROI of ExposureAuto is selected.
EnumEntry.Description: Data ROI of ExposureAuto is selected.

EnumEntry.Name: WhiteBalanceAuto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Data ROI of BalanceWhiteAuto is selected.
EnumEntry.Description: Data ROI of BalanceWhiteAuto is selected.

Integer.Name: RoiOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset of selected ROI.
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset of selected ROI.

Integer.Name: RoiWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Width of selected ROI.
Integer.Description: Width of selected ROI.

Integer.Name: RoiOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset of selected ROI.
Integer.Description: Vertical offset of selected ROI.

Integer.Name: RoiHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Height of selected ROI.
Integer.Description: Height of selected ROI.

Integer.Name: TargetTemperature
Integer.ToolTip: Sets reference temperature for cooling operation.
Integer.Description: Sets reference temperature for cooling operation.

Enumeration.Name: FanOperationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets operation mode of fan.
Enumeration.Description: Sets operation mode of fan.

EnumEntry.Name: Temperature
EnumEntry.ToolTip: fan operation is controlled by temperature.
EnumEntry.Description: fan operation is controlled by temperature. Only if temperature is higher than the value specified by TargetTemperature, fan operates.

Float.Name: FanSpeed
Float.ToolTip: displays revolution speed of fan in rpm(revolutions per minute).
Float.Description: displays revolution speed of fan in rpm(revolutions per minute).

Enumeration.Name: PeltierOperationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets operation mode of peltier.
Enumeration.Description: Sets operation mode of peltier.

Enumeration.Name: HotPixelCorrection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Hot Pixel Correction.
Enumeration.Description: Hot Pixel Correction.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets not to use Hot Pixel Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets not to use Hot Pixel Correction.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets to use Hot Pixel Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets to use Hot Pixel Correction.

Enumeration.Name: FlatFieldCorrection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables Flat Field Correction.
Enumeration.Description: Enables Flat Field Correction.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets not to use Flat Field Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets not to use Flat Field Correction.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets to use Flat Field Correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets to use Flat Field Correction.

Enumeration.Name: FlatFieldDataSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets Flat Field Data Selector.
Enumeration.Description: Sets Flat Field Data Selector.

Enumeration.Name: FlatFieldTargetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets Flat Field Data Target Selector.
Enumeration.Description: Sets Flat Field Data Target Selector.

Integer.Name: FlatFieldTargetLevel
Integer.ToolTip: Sets Flat Field Data Target Level.
Integer.Description: Sets Flat Field Data Target Level.

Command.Name: FlatFieldDataSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves current Flat Field data to nonvolatile memory.
Command.Description: Saves current Flat Field data to nonvolatile memory.

Command.Name: FlatFieldDataLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads Flat Field data from nonvolatile memory.
Command.Description: Loads Flat Field data from nonvolatile memory.

Enumeration.Name: StageMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets operation mode of stage.
Enumeration.Description: Sets operation mode of stage.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono4Frame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One mono image is constructed from 4 frames.
EnumEntry.Description: One mono image is constructed from 4 frames.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono9Frame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One mono image is constructed from 9 frames.
EnumEntry.Description: One mono image is constructed from 9 frames.

EnumEntry.Name: Bayer4Frame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One color image is constructed from 4 frames.
EnumEntry.Description: One color image is constructed from 4 frames.

EnumEntry.Name: Bayer16Frame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One color image is constructed from 16 frames.
EnumEntry.Description: One color image is constructed from 16 frames.

EnumEntry.Name: Bayer36Frame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One color image is constructed from 36 frames.
EnumEntry.Description: One color image is constructed from 36 frames.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono2FrameH
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One mono image is constructed from 2 frames.
EnumEntry.Description: One mono image is constructed from 2 frames.

EnumEntry.Name: Mono2FrameV
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One mono image is constructed from 2 frames.
EnumEntry.Description: One mono image is constructed from 2 frames.

Boolean.Name: MultishotEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: If first trigger is entered, left triggers are generated automatically.
Boolean.Description: If first trigger is entered, left triggers are generated automatically.

Boolean.Name: CalibrationAuto
Boolean.ToolTip: when stage move to default position, calibrate automatically.
Boolean.Description: when stage move to default position, calibrate automatically.

Command.Name: StageReset
Command.ToolTip: Resets state of stage to default.
Command.Description: Resets state of stage to default.

Boolean.Name: StageIndexDisplay
Boolean.ToolTip: overwrites first pixel with stage index.
Boolean.Description: overwrites first pixel with stage index.

Integer.Name: StageStatus
Integer.ToolTip: Gets the status of stage.
Integer.Description: Gets the status of stage.

Integer.Name: StagePosition
Integer.ToolTip: sets XY-coordinate of stage in nanometer unit.
Integer.Description: sets XY-coordinate of stage in nanometer unit. Y-coordinate in upper half word and X-coordinate in lower half word.

Integer.Name: StagePositionX
Integer.ToolTip: Sets X-coordinate of stage in nanometer unit.
Integer.Description: Sets X-coordinate of stage in nanometer unit.

Integer.Name: StagePositionY
Integer.ToolTip: Sets Y-coordinate of stage in nanometer unit.
Integer.Description: Sets Y-coordinate of stage in nanometer unit.

Integer.Name: TestPendingAck
Integer.ToolTip: Tests the device's pending acknowledge feature.
Integer.Description: Tests the device's pending acknowledge feature. When this feature is written, the device waits a time period corresponding to the value of TestPendingAck before acknowledging the write.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Provides the number of bytes transferred for each image or chunk on the stream channel. This includes any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data. This is the total size of data payload for a data block.

Enumeration.Name: DeviceTapGeometry
Enumeration.ToolTip: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This device tap geometry feature describes the geometrical properties characterizing the taps of a camera as presented at the output of the device.

Integer.Name: Image1StreamID
Integer.ToolTip: Stream ID of the 1st image stream from the Device.
Integer.Description: Stream ID of the 1st image stream from the Device.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfigurationPreferredSwitch
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature can be used to change the preferred Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature can be used to change the preferred Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device. If included, it should be read only on Transmitter Devices.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfigurationPreferred
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the preferred Link configuration of the Transmitter Device.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the preferred Link configuration of the Transmitter Device.

Enumeration.Name: CxpLinkConfiguration
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature can be used to set the Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature can be used to set the Link configuration for the communication between the Receiver and Transmitter Device. If included, it should be read only on Transmitter Devices.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the CoaXPress physical connection to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the CoaXPress physical connection to control.

Enumeration.Name: CxpConnectionTestMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables the test mode for an individual physical connection of the Device.
Enumeration.Description: Enables the test mode for an individual physical connection of the Device.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionTestErrorCount
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current connection error count for test packets recieved by the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Integer.Description: Reports the current connection error count for test packets recieved by the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.

Integer.Name: CxpConnectionTestPacketCount
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the current count for test packets recieved by the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.
Integer.Description: Reports the current count for test packets recieved by the device on the connection selected by CxpConnectionSelector.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the factory setting user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the factory setting user set.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.

EnumEntry.Name: Default
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Select the factory setting user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Select the factory setting user set.

Enumeration.Name: SequencerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the sequencer mechanism is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the sequencer mechanism is active.

Enumeration.Name: SequencerConfigurationMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the sequencer configuration mode is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the sequencer configuration mode is active.

Integer.Name: SequencerSetSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the sequencer set to which further feature settings applies.
Integer.Description: Selects the sequencer set to which further feature settings applies.

Integer.Name: SequencerSetActive
Integer.ToolTip: Contains the currently active sequencer set.
Integer.Description: Contains the currently active sequencer set.

Integer.Name: SequencerSetCount
Integer.ToolTip: Sets effective number of sequencer set.
Integer.Description: Sets effective number of sequencer set.
